resources.string: University of Milan. Computer Science Department. Musical Computer Science Lab.

Audiogames Suite developed by Matteo Dell\'Oro, Musical Computer Science student at Università degli Studi di Milano, collaborating with LIM (Laboratorio di Informatica Musicale) of the Computer Science Department.
Strongly recommended to use the app with vertical orientation (portrait).

Picker is a game where the player is presented 2 sounds with different pitches. He has to decide which sound\'s pitch is higher or lower, depending on what the instructions ask. Guessing a sound reduces the difference between the pitches of the next round, while making a mistake ends the game. The sounds can be repeated by pressing the repeat button.

Simon is a memory game where the player has to repeat the combination of sounds played by the computer in the same exact order. It starts from a single sound and adds an additional one every round. Repeating the exact sequence of the round awards 1 point. Doing a mistake ends the game.

Worldwide is a translation game where the player is presented a sentence in English and he has to translate it in a foreign one. Currently there are 2 different languages to choose from (Spanish and Italian). Every sentence has 4 possible translations to choose from and only one is correct. A game lasts 8 rounds with a sentence each. Clicking on the sentence triggers the local pronunciation.

Mastermind is a game where the player has to break the code generated randomly from the computer. A code is a 4 digits number, each digit ranging from 0 to 9. Close the keyboard after inserting the code in order to click the submit button. Making an attempt triggers different hints if the digit is in the code and in the right place (green light in the graphic version), if the digit is in the code but not in that place (yellow light in the graphic version) and if the digit is not in the code at all (red light in the graphic version). A maximum of 9 attempts can be made before the game ends.
Congratulations! The answer was correct. Your score:
Insert the code in the box below
Digit 1. Error! The digit is not in the code
Digit 1. Almost! The digit is in the code but in another place. It might be a place already guessed!
Digit 1. OK! The digit is in the right place
Digit 2. Error! The digit is not in the code
Digit 2. Almost! The digit is in the code but in another place. It might be a place already guessed!
Digit 2. OK! The digit is in the right place
Digit 3. Error! The digit is not in the code
Digit 3. Almost! The digit is in the code but in another place. It might be a place already guessed!
Digit 3. OK! The digit is in the right place
Digit 4. Error! The digit is not in the code
Digit 4. Almost! The digit is in the code but in another place. It might be a place already guessed!
Digit 4. OK! The digit is in the right place
Error! You can\'t put a higher digit than 9.
Error! You can\'t put a lower digit than 0.
